title: Best Facial Spa In Los Angles | Facials Treatment | Crystal Spa
description: Experience the Facial Spa treatments in Los Angeles, at Crystal Spa! Our natural, organic facials in Los Angles will make your skin glowing, brighter and younger.
cleaned_text: OUR BASIC FACIAL Our standard facial is simply a skin treatment that actively cleanses your pores, exfoliates your face, and treats common skin issues. This is a multi-step process that leaves your skin revived and glowing. 55 Minute Session - $80.00 $15 Entrance Fee or Pass
